75: speaker
bg
portraits
msg
Attention! The “Grey Moths” will be back in 1 hour. Set up our defense and prepare for the battle.
各位，离“灰蛾”返回还有1个小时，我们需要立即布置防线，准备迎击。
みなさん、「灰蛾」が戻って来るまであと1時間です。直ちに防衛ラインを整えて、迎撃の準備をしてください。
여러분, 회아가 돌아올 때까지 1시간 남았습니다. 즉시 방어 라인을 정비하고 요격 준비를 하세요.
Ladies and Gentlemen, the Grey Moths will be back in approximately one hour. We need to set up our defenses and prepare for the attack immediately.
Gentlemen, we have one hour before the return of the Grey Moth, so we need to set up our defenses and prepare for the attack immediately.
Ladies and gentlemen, there is only one hour left before the "ash moth" returns. Please immediately set up your defensive lines and prepare to intercept.
msg
All squads return to their positions on standby. Prepare for the battle.
各小队按计划回到各自岗位进入警戒状态，准备迎击。
各小隊は計画通りにそれぞれの持ち場で警戒態勢に入り、迎撃準備。
각 소대는 계획대로 각자의 담당 구역에서 경계 태세에 들어가 요격 준비.
All squads return to their post and prepare for battle.
The squads returned to their posts to enter alert status as planned and prepared to meet the attack.
Each platoon is on alert at their posts as planned and ready to intercept.
choice
Is there any Houkai creature invading?
是有崩坏生物入侵么？
崩壊生物が侵入したの？
붕괴 생물이 침입했어?
Did the Honkai Beasts start attacking?
Are Grey Moths our allies?
灰蛾部队不是友方么？
灰蛾部隊って友軍じゃないの？
회아 부대가 아군이 아니었어?
Are the Grey Moths our allies?
nop
CHOICE_DESTS
76: speaker
bg
portraits
msg
No, but they are coming.
现在没有，不过马上就会来了。
まだです。ですが、すぐにやってきます。
아직입니다. 하지만 곧 도착할 겁니다.
Not yet, but they'll come soon enough.
Not right now, but it will come soon.
Not yet. But it will come soon.
msg
Grey Moths is an investigation team, responsible for supervising the Houkai area in Nagazora and supplying the base with resources.
灰蛾部队是外部调查的部队，她们负责监视长空市崩坏区域的崩坏状况并搜索资源提供基地补给。
灰蛾部隊は外部調査の部隊です。彼女たちは長空市崩壊エリアの崩壊状況の監視と、基地の補給に使える資源の捜索を担当しています。
회아 부대는 외부 조사 부대입니다. 그들은 장공시 붕괴 지역의 붕괴 상황 감시와 기지 보급용 자원 수색을 담당하고 있습니다.
The Grey Moths are an external investigation team. They are responsible for monitoring the Honkai infestation in Nagazora City and searching for resources that can be used to replenish the base.

The Grey Moth unit is an external investigation unit, they are responsible for monitoring the collapse condition of the collapsed area of Long Sky City and searching for resources to provide base supplies.
The Ash Moth Unit is an external survey unit. They are in charge of monitoring the collapse of the Changku City Collapse Area and searching for resources that can be used to replenish the base.
msg
But the team faces great danger out there, and it's very difficult to ensure delivery of supplies. So the team has a unique means of transport.
但是外部调查面临着十分巨大的危险，补给的保障更是难上加难，所以她们有着一个特殊的运输工具。
ですが、外部調査には非常に大きな危険がつきまとい、補給の確保がさらに難易度を上げています。なので、彼女たちは特殊な乗り物を持っています。
하지만 외부 조사에는 막대한 위험이 따르며, 보급 확보가 난이도를 더욱 높입니다. 그래서 그들은 특수 차량을 보유하고 있습니다.

But investigating in the outdoors is fraught with great danger, and having to secure supplies makes it even more challenging. Therefore, these women have a unique means of transport. (TN: Need a better word for 'outdoors')
But the external investigation faces very great danger, the security of supplies is even more difficult, so they have a special means of transport.
But external surveys are fraught with great danger, and securing supplies makes it even more challenging. Therefore, these women have special vehicles.
msg
But the transportation process attracts a lot Houkai creatures, so we have to keep them out of the base.
但是这个运输工具在运行的过程中会吸引大量的崩坏生物注意，所以我们要将这些崩坏生物挡在基地外。
ただし、この乗り物を使うと大量の崩壊生物を引き寄せてしまいます。そのため、私たちはこの崩壊生物を基地の外で防ぐのです。
다만 이 차량 사용시 대량의 붕괴 생물을 유인하게 됩니다. 따라서 우리는 이 붕괴 생물들을 기지 외곽에서 차단하는 것이죠.
However, this vehicle attracts a large number of Honkai beasts during its operation. So we have to prevent these creatures from getting in the base.
But this transport will attract the attention of a large number of avalanche creatures during its operation, so we have to keep these avalanche creatures out of the base.
However, this vehicle attracts a large number of disintegrating organisms. Therefore, we prevent these disintegrating organisms outside of our base.
nop
RETURN_TO_MAIN_BRANCH

portraits
msg
Let me talk about the mission before the battle begins.
乘着作战开始前还有点时间，我来简单说明一下这次的任务吧~
作戦が始まるまでもう少し時間があるから、簡単に今回の任務を説明するね！
작전이 시작되기까지 아직 시간이 조금 있으니, 간단히 이번 임무를 설명해 줄게!
Since there's a little time before the operation begins, I'll briefly explain the details.
Take advantage of a little time before the start of the battle, let me briefly explain the mission ~
Since we have a little more time before the mission starts, let me briefly explain this mission!
msg
We're now close to the control room of the base gate. The facilities here are essential to the control of the base gate, and we need to protect this area.
我们所处的位置是基地闸门的控制室附近，这里是控制闸门闭合的重要设施，我们的任务是保护这个区域的安全。
私たちの今いる位置は基地のゲート制御室の近くよ。ここはゲートの開閉を制御する重要な施設なの。私たちの任務は、このエリアの安全を守ることよ。
우리가 지금 있는 위치는 기지의 게이트 제어실 근처야. 여기는 게이트의 개폐를 제어하는 중요한 시설이야. 우리의 임무는, 이 구역의 안전을 지키는 거야.
Our current location is near the gate control room at the base. This is an important facility that controls the opening and closing of the gates. Our mission is to secure the area.
We are located near the control room of the base gate, which is an important facility for controlling the gate closure, and our task is to secure this area.
Our current location is near the gate control room at the base. This is an important facility that controls the opening and closing of the gates. Our mission is to keep this area safe.
msg
When the gate is open, there will be a lot of Houkai creatures coming in. The teams outside will destroy them.
在闸门开启的这段时间内势必会有大量的崩坏生物涌入，处于正面的主力部队会消灭这些家伙。
ゲートを開く時にはきっと大量の崩壊生物が雪崩込んでくるはずだよ。正面に位置する主力部隊がそいつらを片付けるの。
게이트를 열 때는 분명 대량의 붕괴 생물이 쏟아져 들어올 거야. 정면에 위치한 주력 부대가 그놈들을 처리할 거고.
When they open the gate there will be an onslaught of Honkai beasts. The main force in front of the gate will take care of them.
During the time that the gates are open there will inevitably be a large influx of avalanche creatures, and the main force at the front will destroy these guys.
When they open the gate, there will be an avalanche of decaying organisms. The main force in front of the gate will take care of them.
msg
What we need to do is to protect the control room, ensuring that the gate will be closed smoothly when Grey Moths get in.
我们所要做的就是保护控制室，保证闸门在灰蛾部队进入后正常关闭。
私たちがやることは制御室を守ること。そして、灰蛾部隊が入った後にゲートを正常に閉じること。
우리가 할 일은 제어실을 지키는 것. 그리고 회아 부대가 들어간 뒤에 게이트를 정상적으로 닫는 거야.
What we need to do is protect the control room and ensure that the gate closes properly after the Grey Moths arrive.
All we had to do was protect the control room and ensure that the gates closed properly after the moth forces entered.
What we do is to protect the control room. And to close the gate normally after the ash moth unit enters.
msg
Yssring will be responsible for controlling the gate. Isn't it easy?
控制闸门的任务就交给伊瑟琳了，怎么样是不是很简单呢~
ゲート制御の任務はイザーリンに任せてあるよ！どうかな？とっても簡単でしょ？
게이트 제어 임무는 이자린에게 맡겨뒀어! 어때? 엄청 쉽지?
Yiserin will be responsible for controlling the gate. Very easy, right?
The task of controlling the gates will be given to Estherine, how is it very simple ~
I'll leave the gate control mission to Estherine! How about that? Very easy, isn't it?

そんなに軽々しく言わないでよ……このゲートは基地で一番頑丈なバリケードなんだから。もし故障でもしたら、私たちみんなおしまいなんだよ……。
그렇게 가볍게 말하지 마…… 이 게이트는 기지에서 가장 튼튼한 바리케이드라고. 만약 고장이라도 나면 우리 모두 끝장인 거야…….

The ash moth unit will arrive in five minutes. All units, please follow the plan. Operation start!"
This side is almost clear. But the battle has just begun. Follow me to see the real boss!
呼~这边也清理的差不多了，不过现在开始才是正戏，跟我来吧！马上你就能看到那个大家伙了！
ふぅ～こっちはあらかた片付いたみたいだね。でも本番はこれからだよ。私について来て！すぐに灰蛾とも会えるはず！
후~ 이쪽은 대충 정리된 것 같네. 하지만 본격적인 건 이제부터야. 날 따라와! 곧 회아 부대도 만날 수 있을 거야!
Phew, this side is almost cleared, but now it's time for the main event, follow me! You'll see the big guy soon!
Well, it looks like we're almost done here. But the real work is just beginning. Follow me! I'm sure we'll meet up with the ash moths soon!
伊瑟琳~闸门的情况怎么样？
イザーリン！ゲートの状況はどう？
Yiserin! What's the situation on the gate?
Estherine ~ How are the gates coming?
No problem! It's ready to open, please protect the control room.
没问题，马上准备开启，请保护好控制室。
問題ない。すぐに開けるわ。制御室、しっかり守ってね。
문제없어. 곧 열게. 제어실, 꼭 지켜줘.
No problem, ready to open immediately. Please protect the control room.
No problem. I'll open it right up. Control room, keep it secure.
I see it, it's over there! The Grey Moths in between the ruins!
啊，看到了~看到了~就在那边！那就是穿梭于废墟之中的灰蛾！
あ、見えた～見えた～あそこ！あの廃墟の中をくぐり抜けているのが灰蛾だよ！
아, 보였어~ 보였어~ 저기! 저 폐허 사이를 뚫고 지나가는 게 회나방이야!
Oh, there it is~ There it is~! There's the Grey Moths moving through those ruins!
Ah, I see it~ I see it~ It's over there! That's the gray moth that's traveling through the rubble!
Oh, I see it - I see it - there! That's an ash moth going through those ruins!
軌道戦艦ハイペリオン！
Isn't it cool? It's a real aircraft cruiser, but it's turned into a battleship due to the dysfunctional nuclear engine.
怎么样！很帅吧！这可是货真价实的航空战舰哦~不过因为动力炉损坏了改装成了轨道战舰~
どう？カッコいいでしょ？これが本物の航空戦艦だよ～！でも動力炉の損傷で空は飛べないんだけどね。レール、つまり軌道の上のみを走る戦艦になっちゃった。
어때? 멋지지? 이게 진짜 항공 전함이야~! 하지만 동력로 손상으로 하늘은 날 수 없게 됐어. 레일, 즉 궤도 위에서만 달리는 전함이 돼버렸지.
How do you like it? Isn't it awesome? It's a real aircraft cruiser! But it can't fly because of the damage to its power reactor, so it can only run on rails right now.
How about it! Very handsome, right? This is the real air battleship Oh ~ but because the power furnace is damaged converted into an orbital battleship ~
How do you like it? Isn't it cool? This is a real air battleship! But it can't fly because of the damage to the power reactor. It's now a battleship that runs only on rails, or orbits.
It requires quite an effort to run this battleship. The only drawback is the loud noise it makes.
让这么大的家伙在轨道上运行可是费了好大力气才实现的…现在看来唯一的缺点就是噪音大了点……
こんなに大きなやつがレールの上を走るにはかなりのパワーがいるけどね……それと唯一の欠点は騒音が大きすぎること。
이렇게 큰 녀석이 레일 위를 달리려면 상당한 파워가 필요하지만…… 게다가 유일한 단점은 소음이 너무 크다는 거야.
It took a lot of effort to get a massive battleship like this running on the rails. .....The only downside is that it's way too noisy.
Let such a big guy running on the track but a lot of effort to achieve ... Now it seems that the only drawback is the noise is a little ......
It takes a lot of power for such a big one to run on rails, though. ...... And the only downside is that it's too noisy.
Isn't it great? In this silent world of Houkai, this deafening noise is the proof of our existence.
不是挺好的么~从这个因崩坏而变得死寂的世界中传来的嘶吼，这才是我们的存在证明啊~
別にいいじゃない。崩壊によって死の静けさに包まれたこの世界に雄叫びをあげられるんだから。これこそ私たちの存在証明だよ～！
별로 안 그래. 붕괴로 인해 죽음의 고요에 휩싸인 이 세상에 울부짖을 수 있잖아. 이게 바로 우리의 존재 증명이야~!
But that's fine, isn't it? We can scream out to this world that's been enveloped in the silence of death from the Honkai. This is the proof of our existence~!
Isn't it good~ The hissing from the world that has become dead because of the collapse is the proof of our existence~
It doesn't matter. We can scream out to this world that has been enveloped in the stillness of death by the collapse. This is the proof of our existence~!
Only if everyone is as optimistic as you... Every time I see the crowd of Houkai creatures, I think it's the end of my life.
要是大家都像你这么乐观就好了…每次看到后面那片黑压压的崩坏生物，我就觉得自己活不过今晚……
みんながあなたみたいに楽観的だったらいいんだけど……いつも一緒に来るあの黒々とした崩壊生物を見るたび、生きて帰れる気がしない……。
다들 당신처럼 낙관적이면 좋겠지만...... 항상 함께 오는 그 칠흑 같은 붕괴 생물을 볼 때마다, 살아서 돌아갈 수 있을 것 같지가 않아......
I wish everyone had your optimism... But every time I see the black shadow of a crowd of Honkai beasts running at me, I feel like I won't make it out alive to see the next day....
If only everyone was as optimistic as you are... Every time I see that black crush of collapsing creatures behind me, I feel like I won't survive the night ......
I wish everyone was as optimistic as you are, but every time I see that black disintegrating creature that always comes with me, I don't think I'll make it out alive. ......
Alright. We are prepared to take them down, aren't we?
安啦~我们如此严阵以待不就是为了消灭她们么~
ん～私たちがこんな厳重に構えているのは、あいつらを消滅させるためなんだから大丈夫だよ～！安心して！
음~ 우리가 이렇게 삼엽하게 대비한 건 그 녀석들을 소멸시키기 위해서니까 괜찮아~! 안심해!
Anla ~ we are so ready to destroy them is not it ~
Hmmm~ the only reason we're standing here so sternly is to make those guys disappear, so don't worry~! Don't worry!

「崩壊生物が作戦エリアに入った。作戦開始！」
「붕괴 생물이 작전 구역에 진입. 작전 시작!」

行きましょう！攻撃ののろしが上がったわ！私たちの出番だよ！
가자! 공격 봉화가 올라갔어! 우리의 차례야!
Let's go! You heard the horn, it's our turn to play! (TN: She literally says this in Chinese)

ふぅ～ここまでは全て順調ね。前線の方も大丈夫なはず。もうじき終わるよ！

Whew - all is well so far. The front line should be fine. It will be over soon!

うっ！こんなに早くフラグを折られるなんて！

Hey... Seele, what the heck are those? Bugs? I've never seen Honkai creatures like that...

姐姐大人！我要和你一起去！
お姉ちゃん！私も一緒に行く！
Sister-sama! I want to go with you!

Hyperion stops at the gate. Maybe something happened...

あ……ハイペリオンがゲートの近くで停まった。何かあった……？
아……히페리온이 게이트 근처에서 멈췄어. 무슨 일이 있었던 거야……？
Ah... The Hyperion stopped near the gate. Maybe something happened...
That...Hubleyan stopped near the gates, don't know what happened ......
Oh ...... Hyperion stopped near the gate. What's up ......?
Hyperion? Can we get in touch with the Grey Moths? Tell them to get in here at once!

ハイペリオン？灰蛾と連絡をとれますか？彼女らを今すぐ中に！
히페리온? 회나방과 연락할 수 있나요? 그녀들을 지금 당장 안으로!
Hubertus? Can we get in touch with Grey Moth and get them into the station immediately!
Hyperion? Can you contact the ash moths? Get them inside now!
We can't. The communication has been cut off, and Hyperion seems to be firing its cannon...
联系不上，通讯被切断了，而且…休伯利安的主炮似乎开始运作了……
連絡がつかない……通信が切断されてる。しかも……ハイペリオンの主砲が動き始めてる！
연락이 안 돼……통신이 끊겼어. 게다가……히페리온의 주포가 움직이기 시작했어!
I can't get in contact... The communications are down. And Hyperion's main cannon is starting to move!
Can't get in touch, communications are cut off and...the main cannon of the Hublian seems to be operational ......
I can't contact ...... communications are down. And ...... Hyperion's main gun is starting to move!
Cannon? Inform those at the frontline to take shelter now and stay away from the Hyperion's cannon range!

주포…… 설마! 빨리, 전선에 있는 사람들에게 즉시 엄폐물을 찾아서, 히페리온의 주포 탄도 범위에서 숨고, 떨어지라고 전해 주세요!
The main cannon... Are they trying to... Quick, inform those on the frontlines to seek cover and get out of the cannon's range!
The main gun...are they trying to ...... Quick, inform the front line personnel to find cover immediately and get far away from the ballistic range of the main Hubleyan gun!

She never asks for my permission.
为什么不经过我的同意擅自行动。
どうして同意を得ずに勝手な行動を取るのですか。

Why did you act without my permission?
Why did you act without my permission.
Why do you take the liberty of acting without consent?
speaker
portraits
msg
Time is of the utmost importance during a crisis, and I only make correct decisions in a time like this, that's why I'm still alive.
在危机的时刻时间是最宝贵的，我只是在宝贵的时间内选择了最正确的方案而已，我们正是这样才活到现在。
危険なときに時間は最も貴重なの。私は貴重な時間の中で最良な方法を選択しただけよ。現に今こうして生きているじゃないの。
위험할 때 시간은 가장 귀중한 거야. 나는 귀중한 시간 속에서 최선의 방법을 선택했을 뿐이야. 현실이 이렇게 살아있잖아.
Time is the most precious when we're at risk. I just picked the best choice at that time. That's why we're still alive right now.
In times of crisis time is the most valuable, I just choose the most correct program within the precious time, and that's exactly how we have survived until now.
Time is most precious when it is at risk. I just chose to do the best I could with the precious time I had. I'm alive right now.
